title: Elegant Stay in São Paulo with Onsite Dining, Pool & Sauna
description:
Discover a refined and welcoming retreat in the heart of São Paulo at this stellar property. Contemporary rooms offer a peaceful sanctuary, moments from interesting attractions of the city. Savour the flavours of international cuisine at Bonjardim Restaurant or recharge in the sauna, swimming pool or fitness centre.

Perfectly located, you're minutes from Bixiga’s iconic Italian eateries, cultural landmarks like the Renault Theatre, the green escape of Ibirapuera Park and the vibrant energy of Paulista Avenue. Whether for work or pleasure, this hotel makes every stay effortless and authentically São Paulo.
offer_address: Rua Maestro Cardim, 407 Paraiso, São Paulo 01323000, Brazil

title: São Paulo City Break with Outdoor Pool, Sauna & Brazilian-Italian Fusion Restaurant
description:
Experience the vibrant pulse of São Paulo’s Vila Olímpia district, where designer boutiques, contemporary art galleries and the lush Parque do Povo green space beckon. Savour Italian favourites with a Brazilian touch at the onsite La Forchetta restaurant or head out to discover the nearby foodie and bar scene.

Return to refined comfort with a swim and a spot of sun by the sprawling outdoor pool, or enjoy a session in the fully-equipped fitness centre. Sip craft cocktails at the stylish onsite bar before retreating to the modern comforts of your stylish aprtment.
offer_address: Rua Santa Justina 210, Vila Olimpia, Sao Paulo 04545041, Brazil
